name: Forage&Co. Investments
description:
(WE RECOMMENDED YOU PLAY IN WINDOWED MODE.)

Forage&Co Investments is a game about making the right choices (and also the wrong ones). Follow our elven friends in their journey to rise to the top of Forage&Co Investments, a firm specializing in loaning money to game developers in need. You must pick and choose, grow your roots, and expand your connections by making friends along the way.
